alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Chattooga; Floyd; Gordon (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 8:20PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Floyd, Gordon, central Chattooga and northwestern Bartow Counties through 845 PM EST... At 819 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Subligna to Waterhouse, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Rome, Calhoun, Summerville, Adairsville, Trion, Cave Spring, Kingston, Resaca, Plainville, Shannon, Lyerly, Ranger, Pinson, Subligna, Redbud, Folsom, Lake Marvin, Coosa, Oakman and James H. Floyd State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
